1286174.effect: 2 monsters with different names, except TokensYou can only control 1 "Erousa, Bow of the Goddess". Once per turn, you can also Link Summon "Erousa, Bow of the Goddess" using 1 Link-2 monster you control as material. The original ATK of this card becomes 800 x the number of Link Materials used for its Link Summon. If a linked card you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can make this card lose exactly 800 ATK, instead. If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 monster on the field; equip this card to it, but banish this card when it leaves the field. Once per turn, if this card is equipped to a monster: You can increase that monster's ATK by 800.
1286174.name: Erousa, Bow of the Goddess

1814984.effect:
4+ Effect Monsters
After this card is Special Summoned, your opponent takes no effect damage for the rest of this Duel. While you control no other monsters, you choose the targets for your opponent's card effects. If this card would be destroyed by an opponent's card, you can have it lose exactly 1000 ATK, instead. Once per turn, during the End Phase: This card gains 4000 ATK.
1814984.name: Gluttony, Infernal Forward

1768966.effect:
2 Dragon monsters, including a "Hieratic" monster
(Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 monster from your hand or field, then target up to 1 card each on the field and in the GY; shuffle them into the Deck. If this card is Tributed: Special Summon 1 Dragon Normal Monster, or 1 non-Link "Hieratic" monster, from your hand, Deck, or GY, but make its ATK/DEF 0. You can only use each effect of "Hieratic Dragon of Khonsu" once per turn.
1768966.name: Hieratic Dragon of Khonsu

1646584.effect:
2 Yokai monsters
(This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Beast.)
Once per Chain, when your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 "Kitsune Token" (Yokai/FIRE/Level 1/ATK 100/DEF 100). If a non-Token Yokai monster you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can destroy 1 "Kitsune Token" you control instead.
1646584.name: Kitsune Handmaiden

1599951.effect:
2 monsters with different names
(Quick Effect): You can banish 1 card from your hand; this card gains 500 ATK. If this card is sent to the GY or banished by an opponent's card: You can banish 1 card from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Spawn of Exile" once per turn.
1599951.name: Spawn of Exile

818802.effect:
1 non-Link "Dark World" monster
You can target 1 "Dark World" card in your GY; add it to your hand, then discard 1 card, except a card with the same name as the added card. When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can reveal 2 "Dark World" monsters in your hand; that effect becomes "Your opponent discards 2 cards". You can only use each effect of "Violenn, Recruiter of the Dark World" once per turn.
818802.name: Violenn, Recruiter of the Dark World
818802.treated_as: Violenn, Recruiter of the Dark World

1819463.effect: If an "Umbral Horror" monster or "Number" Xyz Monster is Special Summoned, while this card is in your hand or GY: You can Special Summon this card, also you can have it become Level 2. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Umbral Horror" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Umbral Horror Necromancer". You can only use each effect of "Umbral Horror Necromancer" once per turn. You cannot Normal Summon/Set the turn you activate either effect of this card's effects, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except Xyz Monsters.
1819463.name: Umbral Horror Necromancer

1819460.effect:
If an "Umbral Horror" monster or "Number" Xyz Monster in your possession is destroyed, except "Umbral Horror Shade", while this card is in your hand or GY: You can Special Summon this card, also you can have it become Level 4. You cannot Normal Summon/Set the turn you activate this effect, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except Xyz Monsters. You can only use this effect of "Umbral Horror Shade" once per turn. A Rank 5 or lower DARK "Number" monster has this card attached to it as material gains the following effects.
● Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects during the Battle Phase.
● If your "Umbral Horror" monster is destroyed by battle with an opponent's monster: You can destroy 1 face-up card on the field.
1819460.name: Umbral Horror Shade

1819458.effect:
You can send this card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; apply 1 of the following effects, also the Levels of all monsters Summoned to your field by this effect become Level 2 or 4.
● Special Summon in Attack Position, 1 "Umbral Horror" monster from your Deck to your field and 1 "Umbral Horror Token" (Fiend/DARK/Level 2/ATK 100/DEF 100) to your opponent's field.
● Special Summon 1 "Umbral Horror" monster from your hand, then if you control no other monsters, Special Summon any number of monsters with the same name as that Summoned monster, from your Deck and/or GY.
You cannot Normal Summon/Set the turn you activate this effect, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except Xyz Monsters. You can only use this effect of "Umbral Horror Zombie" once per turn.
1819458.name: Umbral Horror Zombie

1819645.effect: Target up to 2 Level 2 or 4 "Umbral Horror" monster you control; Special Summon 1 "Number 104: Masquerade" or 1 Rank 2 DARK Fiend "Number" monster from your Extra Deck, that requires an amount of Xyz Materials equal to or less than the number of monsters targeted by this effect +1, by using them as material , but its effects are negated (This is treated as an Xyz Summon.), then, Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 "Number C" monster with the same number in its name as that "Number" monster, by using it as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its materials to the Summoned monster.) If a "Number C" monster you control leaves the field by an opponent's card: You can Set this card from your GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use 1 "Rank-Up-Magic Umbral Horror Devilfication" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1819645.name: Rank-Up-Magic Umbral Horror Devilfication

1819461.effect: Target 1 "Number" Xyz Monster you control, except a "Number C" monster; Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 Rank 5 or lower DARK "Number C" monster with the same number in its name as that target, by using it as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its materials to the Summoned monster.) If you control an Xyz Monster that has an "Umbral Horror" card attached as material: You can shuffle this card from your GY into your Deck, and if you do, attach 1 "Number" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck or GY with the same number in its name as a DARK "Number C" Xyz Monster you control, to that monster as material. You can only use each effect of "Rank-Up-Magic Umbral Horror's Dark Destiny" once per turn.
1819461.name: Rank-Up-Magic Umbral Horror's Dark Destiny

1819504.effect:
Your opponent cannot target Rank 5 or lower DARK "Number C" Xyz Monsters you control that have a "Number" monster with the same number in its name attached to them as material with card effects. You can only use each of the following effects of "Umbral Horror Summoning" once per turn.
● During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Umbral Horror" monster from your GY. You cannot Normal Summon/Set the turn you activate this effect.
● During the End Phase: You can target 1 "Umbral Horror" card in your GY; add it to your hand or attach it to a Rank 5 or lower "Number" Xyz Monster you control as material.
1819504.name: Umbral Horror Summoning

1819456.effect:
During damage calculation, if your DARK "Number" monster battles an opponent's monster: You can detach 1 material from your battling monster, and if you do, it gains ATK/DEF equal to the value of the "Number" in its name x100 during that damage calculation only, also halve any battle damage your opponent takes from this battle. You can activate the following effects based on the Type of "Number" Xyz Monster(s) you control that have a "Umbral Horror" card attached as material. You can only use each of the following effects of "Umbral Horrorscape" once per turn.
● Fiend: You can target 1 "Umbral Horror" monster or "Number" Xyz Monster you control; it can make up to 2 attacks during each Battle Phase this turn.
● Spellcaster: During your Main Phase: Draw cards equal to the number of "Number" Xyz Monsters you control with different number(s) in their name.
1819456.name: Umbral Horrorscape

1819510.effect:
Activate 1 of these effects.
● When an attack is declared involving a DARK monster: Target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
● If a monster is destroyed during the Battle Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Umbral Horror" monster with 0 ATK from your Deck in Attack Position.
During your opponent's turn: You can banish this card from your GY; choose 1 "Rank-Up-Magic" Spell from your Deck and place it on top of your Deck, also during your next turn, you cannot Normal Summon/Set monsters, or Special Summon monsters from your Extra Deck, except Xyz Monsters. You can only use each effect of "Umbral Horror Nightmare" once per turn.
1819510.name: Umbral Horror Nightmare

1819494.effect: When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or effect, while you control a "Number" Xyz Monster that has an "Umbral Horror" card attached to it as material: You can detach 1 material from an Xyz Monster you control; negate the activation, and if you do, you can attach that negated card to a Rank 5 or lower DARK "Number C" Xyz Monster you control as material. You can only use this effect of "Umbral Horror Sorcery" once per turn. Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can have all "Number" Xyz Monsters you control gain 200 ATK/DEF for each material attached to it. You can banish this card from face-up on your field or in your GY; Special Summon 1 "Umbral Horror" monster from your hand.
1819494.name: Umbral Horror Sorcery

1803739.effect:
Cannot be Special Summoned. If this card is flipped face-up, it is unaffected by your opponent's activated effects that were activated while this card was face-down on the field. You can only use each of the following effects of "Tephro, Commander of Laclade" once per turn.
● (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Clad" Trap you control; activate it.
● When this card is returned to the hand by its own effect, you can add 1 "Clad" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Normal Summoned or flipped face-up this turn: Return this card to the hand.
1803739.name: Tephro, Commander of Laclade

1803690.effect:
Cannot be Special Summoned. If this card is flipped face-up, it is unaffected by your opponent's activated effects that were activated while this card was face-down on the field. You can only use each of the following effects of "Tremor, Envoy of Laclade" once per turn.
● (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Clad" Trap you control; activate it.
● When this card is returned to the hand by its own effect, you can shuffle up to 3 cards from the GYs into the Deck(s).
Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Normal Summoned or flipped face-up this turn: Return this card to the hand.
1803690.name: Tremor, Envoy of Laclade

1803752.effect:
Cannot be Special Summoned. If this card is flipped face-up, it is unaffected by your opponent's activated effects that were activated while this card was face-down on the field. You can only use each of the following effects of "Typhoon, Prophet of Laclade" once per turn.
● (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Clad" Trap you control; activate it.
● When this card is returned to the hand by its own effect, you can Special Summon 1 "Clad" Spirit monster from your Deck in face-down Defense Position, ignoring its Summoning conditions.
Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Normal Summoned or flipped face-up this turn: Return this card to the hand.
1803752.name: Typhoon, Prophet of Laclade

1803577.effect: Equip only to a "Clad" Spirit monster. It cannot be destroyed by battle. When the equipped monster attacks and destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Spirit monster from your Deck, ignoring its Summoning conditions. If this card is sent to the GY because the equipped monster was returned to the hand: You can add this card from your GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Clad Condemned Maul" once per turn.
1803577.name: Clad Condemned Maul

1803589.effect: Once per turn, if a Spirit monster is Summoned to your field or flipped face-up: You can target 1 Spirit monster or 1 "Clad" Spell/Trap in your GY; shuffle it into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. If your opponent activates a card or effect that would target a face-down "Clad" Spirit monster(s) you control: You can change that target(s) to face-up Defense Position. If a card you control would return to your hand, you can return this card from your field to your hand instead. You can only use this effect of "Laclade" once per turn.
1803589.name: Laclade

1803580.effect:
Activate 1 of these effects, or, if you control at least 2 Spirit monsters with different Types and/or Attributes, apply all of these effects;
● Add 1 "Clad" Spirit monster from your Deck to you hand.
● Set 1 "Clad" Spell/Trap from your Deck, except "Laclade Prophecy".
● Spirit monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF.
You can only activate 1 "Laclade Prophecy" per turn. You cannot activate monster effects for the rest of this turn after this card is activated, except Spirit monsters.
1803580.name: Laclade Prophecy

1803676.effect:
During either player's Main Phase: You can activate 1 of these effects;
● Change 1 face-down monster you control to face-up Attack or Defense Position.
● Immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Clad" Spirit monster face-up.
If a face-up Spirit monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can return this face-up card from your field to your hand instead. You can only use each effect of "Laclade Reinforcment Portal" once per turn.
1803676.name: Laclade Reinforcment Portal

1803659.effect:
When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Return 1 card you control to the hand; Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Warrior/Spirit/LIGHT/Level 11/ATK 3200/DEF 2400). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.) If Summoned this way, until this card activates its following effect, it is unaffected by your opponent's card effects.
● (Quick Effect): Discard 1 card, and if you do, shuffle 1 card your opponent controls into the Deck.
This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Special Summoned using its effect this turn: Return this card to the hand.
1803659.name: Tephro Clad - Punishment

1803667.effect:
When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Tribute 1 Spirit monster; Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Warrior/Spirit/DARK/Level 11/ATK 2000/DEF 3600). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.) If Summoned this way, until this card activates its following effect, it is unaffected by your opponent's card effects.
● (Quick Effect): Destroy all Attack Postion monsters your opponent controls.
This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Special Summoned using its effect this turn: Return this card to the hand.
1803667.name: Tremor Clad - Barrier

1803663.effect:
When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Discard 2 cards; Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Warrior/Spirit/WATER/Level 11/ATK 2800/DEF 2800). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.) If Summoned this way, until this card activates its following effect, it is unaffected by your opponent's card effects.
● (Quick Effect): Draw 2 cards, and if you do, you can Set any number of Trap Cards you drew with this effect, also they can be activated this turn.
This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Special Summoned using its effect this turn: Return this card to the hand.
1803663.name: Typhoon Clad - Restoration

1816306.effect: You can target 1 banished "D/D" monster and 1 banished "Dark Contract" Spell/Trap; shuffle them into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "D/D Amalgam" once per turn.
1816306.name: D/D Amalgam
1816306.pendulum_effect: While this card is face-up in your Extra Deck, you cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "D/D" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. You can send 1 other "D/D" or "Dark Contract" card you control to the GY; Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone, and if you do, send 1 "D/D" Pendulum card from the Deck to the GY, then take 1000 damage. You can only use this effect of "D/D Amalgam" once per turn.

1658836.effect:
2+ Effect Monsters, including a "D/D/D" monster
Cannot be targeted for attacks. You can target 1 "D/D" card in your Pendulum Zone; return it to the hand, and if you do, place 1 "D/D" card with a different name than that returned card from your hand or face-up Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zone. You can declare 1 Level between 1 and 7; monsters this card points to become that declared Level for the rest of this turn. You can only use each effect of "D/D/D Abyssal Doom King Soulomon" once per turn.
1658836.name: D/D/D Abyssal Doom King Soulomon

1811950.effect: If you control a "D/D" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can banish this card from your GY; take 1 "D/D" monster from your Deck, and either add it to your hand or send it to the GY. You can only use 1 "D/D Withered Soul" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1811950.name: D/D Withered Soul
1811950.pendulum_effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "D/D" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. If you Special Summon a "D/D" monster(s) from the Extra Deck, except a Pendulum Monster: You can destroy this card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "D/D" monster from your GY in Defense Position, then you lose 1000 LP. You can only use this effect of "D/D Withered Soul" once per turn.

1811581.effect: 1 "D/D" monster This card's Link Rating is also treated as a Level. You can target 1 "D/D" monster you control; change this card's Level to be the same as that target's, until the end of this turn. You can only Link Summon "D/D/D Expansion King Napoleon" once per turn.
1811581.name: D/D/D Expansion King Napoleon

1811934.effect: 2 Level 8 "D/D" monstersYou can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 "D/D" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but it loses 500 ATK. You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 card your opponent controls; banish it. You can banish this card from your GY; Fusion Summon 1 "D/D" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material. You can only use each effect of "D/D/D Corruption King Gastra" once per turn.
1811934.name: D/D/D Corruption King Gastra

1587997.effect: If a Link Monster is on the field: You can discard 1 card; Special Summon this card (from your hand). This card can be treated as a Link-2 for the Link Summon of a Spellcaster Link Monster. During your 2nd Standby Phase after this card is Summoned: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Lightray Orb Dracomagician - Navi" from your GY or that is banished. You can only use each effect of "Bluewing Orb Magician - Navi" once per turn.
1587997.name: Bluewing Orb Magician - Navi

1585955.effect: When you opponent activates a Spell/Trap card or effect, while you control a Level 7 or 8 monster (Quick Effect): You can reveal this card in your hand and banish 1 other "Orb" Spellcaster monster from your hand, field, or GY; negate that card or effect, and if you do, banish it, also Special Summon this card in Defense Position. During your 2nd Standby Phase after this card is Summoned: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Poised Orb Dracomagician - Minaka" from your GY or that is banished. You can only use each effect of "Koto-Playing Orb Magician - Minaka" once per turn.
1585955.name: Koto-Playing Orb Magician - Minaka

1585923.effect:
(This card is also always treated as a Spellcaster monster.)
If this card is in your hand: You can target 1 Level 8 "Orb Magician" monster you control; change its Level to 4, and if you do, Special Summon this card, but this card's original becomes Level 4 if Summoned this way. During your 2nd Standby Phase after this card is Summoned: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Watchful Orb Dracomagician - Alynna" that is banished or in your GY. You can only use each effect of "Elven Orb Magician - Alynna" once per turn.
1585923.name: Elven Orb Magician - Alynna

1585827.effect: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 7 "Orb Magician" monster from your hand or GY in Defense Position. During the Main Phase, except the turn this card was Summoned (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Darkflower Orb Magician - Ponno" from your hand, Deck, or GY. You can only use each effect of "Orb Magicians' Familiar - Ponno" once per turn.
1585827.name: Orb Magicians' Familiar - Ponno

1585892.effect: When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of "Orb Magicians' Familiar - Ponno": Shuffle "Orb Magician" monsters that are banished or in your GY into your Deck, up to the number of face-up cards on the field; All monsters you control gain ATK equal to the number of cards shuffled into the Deck x 100. You can target 1 "Orb Magician" monster you control; shuffle 1 of your banished monsters into the Deck, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Level 7 "Orb Magician" monster from your hand, Deck or GY in Defense Position, with a different attribute than the targeted monster's. You can only activate each effect of "Darkflower Orb Magician - Ponno" once per turn.
1585892.name: Darkflower Orb Magician - Ponno

1662535.effect: If you control no monsters, or if the only monster you control is a Level 7 or higher FIRE monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. During your 2nd Standby Phase after this card is Summoned: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Dreamy Orb Magician - Remu" from your hand, Deck, or GY. You can only use each effect of "Fire Orb Magician - Remu" once per turn.
1662535.name: Fire Orb Magician - Remu

1662562.effect: When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of "Fire Orb Magician - Remu" or "Magical Whispy Wand - Lurik": You can shuffle "Orb Magician" monsters that are banished or in your GY into your Deck, up to the amount of monsters your opponent controls. If you control a Level 7 or higher FIRE or "Orb Magician" monster, you take no battle damage from battles involving your monsters. (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 FIRE monster from your GY; inflict damage to your opponent equal to that banished monster's ATK, and if you do, you take no effect damage for the rest of this turn. You can only activate this effect of "Dreamy Orb Magician - Remu" once per turn.
1662562.name: Dreamy Orb Magician - Remu

1662588.effect:
(This card is always treated as an "Orb Magic" card.)
Equip only to a FIRE monster. If the equipped monster inflicts damage by battle or card effect: You can send 1 FIRE or "Orb Magician" monster from your Deck to the GY. If this card is equipped to "Fire Orb Magician - Remu": You can banish this card and shuffle that monster into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Dreamy Orb Magician - Remu" that is banished or in your hand, Deck or GY. You can only activate 1 "Magical Whispy Staff - Lurik" per turn.
1662588.name: Magical Whispy Staff - Lurik

1662634.effect:
(This card is always treated as an "Orb Magic" card.)
Target 1 "Elven Orb Magician - Alynna" you control or in your GY; this card's name is treated as that monster's name, also banish that monster and 1 other Level 7 or 8 monster you control or in your GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Watchful Orb Dracomagician - Alynna from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Synchro Summon.) You can only activate 1 "Grace of the Grove" per turn. You cannot activate this card if you have Special Summoned an "Orb Dracomagican" monster from the Extra Deck this turn.
1662634.name: Grace of the Grove

1587647.effect:
(This card is always treated as an "Orb Magic" card.)
Pay half your LP, then target 1 Level 7 "Orb Magician" monster that is banished or in your hand or GY; this card's name becomes that card's name until the end of this turn, also Special Summon 1 Level 8 monster from your Deck that specifically lists that targeted card's name in its text, and if you do, any damage your opponent takes is halved until the End Phase. You can only activate 1 "Nere's M-orb-id Reflection" per turn.
1587647.name: Nere's M-orb-id Reflection

1662669.effect:
(This card is always treated as an "Orb Magic" card.)
All "Orb Magician" monsters you control and in your GY cannot be banished, except by the effects of "Orb Magic" cards. Once per turn, if you control "Koto-Playing Orb Magician" or "Poised Orb Dracomagician - Minaka": You can return 1 of your banished "Orb Dracomagician" monsters to your GY, then declare 1 card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap); until the end of this turn, your opponent cannot respond to the activation of cards and effects you control, except with cards of that declared card type. You can only control 1 "Draconic Tuning".
1662669.name: Draconic Tuning

1662729.effect:
(This is always treated as a "Orb Magic" card.)
When your opponent activates a monster card or effect, while you control an "Orb Magician" monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, banish 1 card from each player's field. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or effect, while this card is in your GY, except the turn this card was sent to the GY, while you control no monsters: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Orb Dracomagician" monster that is banished or in your GY. You can only activate each effect of "Spectrum-Winged Slashes" once per turn.
1662729.name: Spectrum-Winged Slashes

1587603.effect:
3 Level 8 monsters 
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon this card by using 3 Level 7 monsters you control as material. If this card has "Koto-Playing Orb Magician - Minaka" as Xyz material, or if this card was Special Summoned by the effect of "Koto-Playing Orb Dracomagician - Minaka", it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; this card gains ATK equal to the ATK of the material detached from this card. You can shuffle 2 "Orb Magic" Spells/Traps that are banished or in your GY into the Deck, then target 1 "Orb Magician" monster that is banished or in your GY; attach it to this card as material. You can only use each effect of "Poised Orb Dracomagician - Minaka" once per turn.
1587603.name: Poised Orb Dracomagician - Minaka

1588052.effect:
2+ Spellcaster monsters, including an "Orb Magician" monster
 If this card is Link Summoned using "Lightray Orb Magician - Navi" as material, or Special Summoned by the effect of "Bluewing Orb Magician - Navi": You can return 3 banished cards to your GY for each card this card points to. If a monster this card points would be destroyed, you can banish the top 2 cards of your Deck instead. You can only use each effect of "Lightray Orb Dracomagician - Navi" once per turn. All "Orb Magician" and "Orb Dracomagician" monsters this card points to can attack directly, but any damage they inflict to your opponent is halved. This card is also DARK, EARTH, WATER, FIRE, and WIND-Attribute while face-up on the field or in the GY.
1588052.name: Lightray Orb Dracomagician - Navi

1585941.effect:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "Orb Magician" monsters
This card is also a Spellcaster and Dragon monster. If this card is Synchro Summoned using "Elven Orb Magician - Alynna" as material, or Special Summoned by the effect of "Elven Orb Magician - Alynna": Gain LP equal to your current LP. While you control another "Orb Magician" monster, your opponent cannot target monsters you control with Spell/Trap Card effects. If your opponent declares an attack (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Orb Magician" from your GY; negate that attack, and if you do, gain LP equal to the ATK of the card banished by this effect. You can only use each effect of "Watchful Orb Magician - Alynna" once per turn.
1585941.name: Watchful Orb Dracomagician - Alynna

If a monster(s) this card points to is banished: You can Special Summon 1 banished monster, except 1 of those banished monsters. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you use either of these preceding effects, except "Spacial D monsters, also you cannot activate cards or effects the turn you use either of these preceding effects, except "Spacial D" cards and effects. 1715498.effect: When this card is Summoned: This card gains ATK equal to the total Levels of all monsters you control x 100. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can make this card lose 1000 ATK; For the rest of this turn, neither player can Special Summon monsters from their Extra Deck, except "Modernote" Link monsters, while this card is face-up on the field. You can only use this effect of "Modernote Idol - Ecclesia" once per turn. During the End Phase: You can banish the top card of your Extra Deck, then target 1 "Modernote Idol" monster you control; that card gains ATK equal to the banished monster's ATK.

1715406.effect: If you control a monster whose current ATK is different from its original ATK, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. When this card is Summoned: This card gains ATK equal to the total original ATK of all monsters you control. During your Main Phase: You can reduce this card's ATK in multiples to 500 (max. 11) until the end of this turn, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Modernote" monster from your hand, whose Level is equal to or lower than the number of multiples paid, but it's original ATK becomes 0. You can only use this effect of "Modernote Electro" once per turn.
1715406.name: Modernote Electro

1716664.effect:
2+ monsters, including a "Modernote Idol" monster
When this card is Link Summoned: This card gains ATK equal to the total Levels and Link Rating of all monsters you control x 100, also place 2 Idol Counters on this card. When your opponent declares an attack, or activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can remove 1 Idol Counter from this card, then target 1 "Modernote" monster in your GY, except "Modernote Idol - Perpetua"; Special Summon that monster to a Main Monster Zone this card points to, and if the Summoned monster was a "Modernote Idol" monster, all monsters you control gain 1000 ATK. You can only use this effect of "Modernote Idol - Perpetua" once per turn. During the Standby Phase: You can send 1 the top card of your Deck to the GY, and if you do, place 1 Idol Counter on this card.
1716664.name: Modernote Idol - Perpetua

1716636.effect:
2+ monsters, including a "Modernote Idol" monster

DARK: When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 "Modernote Idol" monster you control; negate that effect, and if you do, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.
LIGHT: You can Tribute 1 "Modernote" monster you control: All monsters you control gain ATK equal to that card's original DEF.
You can only control 1 "Modernote Idol - Hikari".

42122.effect:
You do not take battle damage from battles involving a "Gravitron" monster(s) you control. The first time each "Gravitron" monster you control would be destroyed by card effect each turn, it is not destroyed. Once per turn: you can roll a die, and, based on the result, add 1 "Gravitron" monster from your Deck to your hand with the corresponding Attribute.
1: LIGHT
2: DARK
3: WIND
4: WATER
5: FIRE
6: EARTH
